name: SnippetVault - store Snippets
description: Store code snippets in your Repl, easily and without taking up space in your repl!
longDescription:
# SnippetVault
Stay on top of your tasks with SnippetVault, the successor to the Todo Extension. This upgraded version features user-wide code snippets, an improved UI, enhanced functionality, and no file creation in your repl. All data is stored in your localStorage, which is better than before, saving space in your repl and providing more secure content storage.


## Controls:![Control preview](https://r.aadsel.repl.co/i/zkLYyg.png)
